DOC.brief_summary: It unknown impact deep neuromuscular paralysis use novel agent , sugammadex reversal endolaryngeal surgery . We also descriptively examine patient would safely discharge recovery room .
DOC.brief_title: Deep v Moderate Neuromuscular Blockade With Rocuronium Patients Undergoing Endolaryngeal Procedures
